mdRecord.dcterms:title: College Presbyterian Church Letter
mdRecord.dcterms:description: February, 1964 starting “For more than a year a group of adults, who either are members of or regularly attend College Church, have been meeting…” / A letter describing the formation of the interracial study group started at College Church in the Summer of 1961. / Individuals referenced: Mrs. Grier, Mrs. McRae, Mr. Layton, Mr. Miller, Mr. Whitted, Mr. Clower
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Unknown
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: United States--Race Relations
Civil Rights Movements--United States
School Integration--Massive Resistance Movement--Southern States
Prince Edward County Free School Association (Va.)
Prince Edward County (Va.)
